(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 6, col = 12)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 6, col = 12)

Since the current position of the avatar has not changed from the last position, I need to take a different action from the last time in order to move or react properly. 

Right now, my avatar is located at (6, 12) where there is a dirt block ('&') directly in front of me in terms of movement (down), but it would be better to explore sideways, which allows for possible diamond collection.

I'll choose to move left to (6, 11) and see if I can interact with any items or resources there.

``` Action: 2 ``` 

I expect that moving left will provide more options and lead to a different part of the level, possibly revealing more resources or paths towards the exit.
